dasomchoi@kaist.ac.kr
Hello! ðŸ‘‹ I am currently a Ph.D student in the Department of Industrial Design at KAIST. I am working with Prof. Hwajung Hong at DxD Lab.

My research focuses on designing inclusive AI systems for minority groups of people. Especially, I am interested in investigating how current AI services address the unique identities and values of users with disabilities. Based on these understandings, I am recently working on leveraging AI to enrich the communication of non-verbal autistic children. {/*

*/} {/* Keywords: Human-AI Interaction; Value-sensitive AI; Neurodiverse population */}
